title: Naked Alibi [1954] Sterling Hayden, Gloria Grahame

sources.title: Naked Alibi
sources.description: You can find out more about this movie from Wikipedia and Film Nolr of the Week . Naked Alibi is a 1954 American Film Noir directed by Jerry Hopper and starring Sterling Hayden and Gloria Grahame. Gloria Grahame was at the peak of her Hollywood career in 1954 with a string of recent noir films to her credit - Sudden Fear (1952), The Big Heat (1953), The Good Die Young (1954) and Human Desire (1954) - when she made Naked Alibi.
